popt4jlib.PS.FA

Interface ChromosomeUpdaterIntf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DblArray1StdChromosomeUpdater

    public interface ChromosomeUpdaterIntf
    updates chromosome-i to move towards chromosome-j according to the params found in params.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void incrementGeneration()
      optional operation, needed only if some kind of "annealing" of the a_t parameters is to take place.
      java.lang.Object update(java.lang.Object chromosomei, java.lang.Object chromosomej, java.util.Hashtable params)
      creates a new chromosome (starting with chromosomei) that is somehow closer to chromosomej.

    • Method Detail

                      java.lang.Object chromosomej,
                      java.util.Hashtable params)
                        throws OptimizerException
        creates a new chromosome (starting with chromosomei) that is somehow closer to chromosomej.

      • incrementGeneration

        void incrementGeneration()
        optional operation, needed only if some kind of "annealing" of the a_t parameters is to take place. Otherwise, may be left as a no-op operation.
